item.title: Why Publisher's Retirement Might Be Your Design Wake-Up Call
item.author: https://example.com (Mike Turko)
item.description:
Unveiling The Future

In an effort to enhance user experience and introduce new features that go hand in hand with emerging trends, Microsoft occasionally discontinues services for some products. This time around it’s Microsoft Publisher that’s reaching its end of life in October 2026. However, don’t fret! As one door closes another opens - there are numerous other advanced tools within and outside the Microsoft 365 suite that offer similar functionalities.

item.title: 5 Simple Design Hacks to Help Non-Graphic Designers Create Professional Results
item.author: https://example.com (Mike Turko)
item.description:
Design Smart, Not Hard

Creating professional visuals doesn’t require years of training. Whether you’re designing social posts, flyers, or slides, these five strategic hacks will help you craft polished graphics that command attention. Let’s turn your DIY designs from “meh” to masterpiece.

item.title: Triathlon Time Calculator: Predict Your Race Finish
item.author: https://example.com (Mike Turko)
item.description:
Unlock Your Triathlon Potential

Precision Race Time Calculator

Ready to take your triathlon training to the next level? Whether you’re a seasoned Ironman veteran or a first-time Sprint competitor, my calculator helps you predict your finish time with accuracy—tailored to your pace and race distance.

item.title: Brand Kit Generator
item.author: https://example.com (Mike Turko)
item.description:
How To Use This Tool

  1. Select a Style: Choose a style that matches your brand personality
  2. Choose Background: Pick light or dark background preference
  3. Generate: Create your brand kit with one click
  4. Customize: Regenerate specific elements as needed

Your brand kit includes color palette, accessibility check, typography, icons, and preview examples.
